short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy ChatGPT answers with ease. Click the sticky icon to quickly copy to your clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT Copier is a must-have extension for anyone who uses ChatGPT. It adds a sticky icon next to each answer, making it incredibly easy to copy the answers you need. No more manual copying and pasting - just click the icon and you're done! This extension is perfect for anyone who wants to save and use ChatGPT's answers in their own work. Don't waste time copying and pasting - install ChatGPT Copier today and get the answers you need with just one click.
